Package com.lipari.app.users.repositories

Interface RoleRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Role,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Role,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Role,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Role>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Role,Long>
@Repository public interface RoleRepo extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Role,Long>
